# ICT01_1SAY2122

My portfolio of MATLAB code for Map√∫a University's **ICT01** _(Empowerment Technologies: IT for Professional Tracks)_ for **Academic Year 2021-2022**

## Background
This repository contains the programs and codes that introduced me to programming and set the course of my life for the foreseeable future. These programs were made during my take in ICT01 in 2021, culminating with our [Trigonometric Grapher](https://github.com/ketpadilla/ict01_1S2122/tree/48d7790ec3680f321d036918c250ef81f11b88ff/project).

## Disclaimer
This repository is intended for documentation only. It is **not** meant to facilitate academic dishonesty, plagiarism, or any unethical practices. Users are encouraged to utilize this repository responsibly and in compliance with applicable professional standards and organizational guidelines.

By accessing or using this repository, you agree to:
- Respect intellectual property rights.
- Use the resources provided here solely for legitimate purposes.
- Avoid misrepresenting the contents as your own in academic or professional settings.
